thread.title: BRIEF-Universal Scientific Industrial Shanghai Sees 2017 Net Profit To Rise 63.1 Percent Y/Y

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Universal Scientific Industrial Shanghai Sees 2017 Net Profit To Rise 63.1 Percent Y/Y

organizations.name: universal scientific industrial shanghai co ltd

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Universal Scientific Industrial Shanghai Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT EXPECTS 2017 NET PROFIT TO RISE 63.1 PERCENT Y/Y FROM 805.6 MILLION YUAN ($127.22 million) YEAR AGO Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2FsfXIo Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3321 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
